page.title: 06Farming Day
page.content: When I am not at school I get up at 5 a.m. with my Dad and go and bring the cows out of the field and into the collecting yard.Then we start milking and afterwards we have to clean out the parlour.The milk tanker collects the milk at 8.00 p.m.At 8.30 p.m. we go in for our breakfast which lasts until 9.00 p.m.After breakfast we go out again to roll the fields and it takes about three hours per field. Lunch is from midday until 1 p.m and then we have to clean the bulk tank and do general work around the farm depending on the time of year.At 2.30 p.m.we collect the cows again and milk them.When we have cleaned out the parlour we carry on rolling until dinner time at 6.00p.m.After dinner we carry on rolling until it is dark but sometimes I go fishing in our ponds. I go to bed about 9.30 to 10.00p.m.
